name: BULLETBALL (RadMcCool)
description:
shoot the balls
are there still balls?
then pick-up your bullets and keep shooting the balls before time is up

standard FPS controls for keybord+mouse or controller ("E" or bottom face button on controller to confirm in menus)

basically didnt finish, but i slept the right amount and ate food 3 times a day, so i call that a win
